title: JK 96 helmet
text:
JK 96 Light Steel Helmet () is a Chinese copy of the <a href="United%20States">American</a> <a href="Personnel%20Armor%20System%20for%20Ground%20Troops">Personnel Armor System for Ground Troops</a> helmet. The liner is a copy of the American "Riddel" suspension system. Being manufactured since 1996 for Chinese service only
The Chinese PASGT-style helmet is not made of composite material, but rather from light steel.
The helmet is worn by some elements of the <a href="People%27s%20Liberation%20Army">People's Liberation Army</a> and police SWAT teams in <a href="China">China</a> to replace <a href="Soviet%20Union">Soviet</a>-era headgear.
The JK 96b is a version of the JK 96a with a different nylon lining.
